channel.title: org on Jasblog
channel.description: Recent content in org on Jasblog

item.title: Org-Spreadsheet
item.description: Intro This is getting pretty interesting. The spreadsheet functionality of org-tables is more impressive than I would have guessed. For small example here’s a snapshot of a diet.org file I’ve been working on. * Food Lookup Table #+TBLNAME: nutrition | name | cal/g | fat%g | carb%g | prot%g | |----------------+-------+-------+--------+--------| | corn beef hash | 1.64 | 10 | 10 | 7 | * Food Log #+TBLNAME: diet | timestamp | name | grams | cal/g | calories | |------------------------+----------------+-------+-------+----------| | [2021-01-15 Fri 13:35] | corn beef hash | 198 | 1.
